column2: A most basic keep, with a simple fortification setup around a steep hill...
The keep now properly elevated on a leveled area, now boasts of a proper courtyard...
A log keep, equipped with a kitchen, stables, granary and a watchtower...
This castle keep wood structures have been replaced with cold, sturdy stone...
An additional set of walls has been erected around this castle keep...
Small defensive structures have been constructed on the edges of the castle walls...
This castle is equipped with raised angular structures along its walls...
With a new gatehouse, outer wall and towers this castle is defenses are formidable...
With the completion of the outer bailey everyday life has been accommodated inside these castle walls...
A myriad of rooms, halls, yards and towers aggrandize this enormous castle...
Raised dirt coupled with uneven rocks currently provide some cover...
Small mud bricks cobbled together forming a defensive perimeter...
Sharpened sticks have been deployed around a mud wall...
Uneven tree logs held together by fiber have replaced basic mud structures...
A thick curtain of wooden walls protects this keep...
The first set of stone defenses have begin to surround this keep...
A curtain of sturdy stone walls surround this castle...
Reinforced with basalt, these walls could withstand significant damage...
Over time these castle walls have been greatly augmented...
No castle is truly impregnable, but, these sure make it an almost impossible task...
Some isolated lowborn farming folk live around [From.Capital.GetName]...
The once isolated smallfolk have since joined in a small, but, promising settlement near [From.Capital.GetName]...
A little village prospers under [From.Capital.GetName] walls...
A small village prospers under [From.Capital.GetName] walls...
A village boasting two inns, a butcher and a blacksmith can be found near [From.Capital.GetName]...
This town near [From.Capital.GetName] walls is a reliable source of money, arms and grain...
One of the largest [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] towns in the region prospers under [From.Capital.GetName]...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] draws considerable strength from this town...
This town has become so large and rich many consider it to be a fledgling city...
Some men with outdated information and half completed maps are in charge of amassing troops...
A tally system for hamlets, villages and towns has been implemented...
Outposts with fresh horses have been constructed in the major roads...
This realms innovations make it possible to field armies in half the time it once took...
A new concept of registration for active service has been implemented, men may be called to arms at any time...
A small arms storage near the granary...
A crude structure for men-at-arms, bunks and an armory slapped together...
A proper barracks, still on the small side, where [From.Capital.GetName] man-at-arms can rest their feet...
The barracks at [From.Capital.GetName] have been expanded, no boasting of a second floor...
Renovations at [From.Capital.GetName] barracks has finished, almost doubling its original size...
[From.Capital.GetName] barracks are bursting at the seams...
Now a wing at [From.Capital.GetName] keep, these men-at-arms have everything at their disposal...
A novice bowyer currently serves at [From.Capital.GetName]...
The humble bowyer and his apprentices go about their business...
The senior bowyer and his apprentices go about their business...
With apprentices becoming craftsman, the bowyer at [From.Capital.GetName] is bursting with activity...
[From.Capital.GetName] household guard is never wanting in bows...
[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] archers are renowned across the land for their quality bows...
[From.Capital.GetName] boasts one of the biggest archery workshops in the known world...
A wooden hitch outside [From.Capital.GetName] walls holds a small amount of horses...
A crude roofed structure at [From.Capital.GetName] houses it's horses...
Now with rudimentary bays, the horses at [From.Capital.GetName] are thriving...
Room has been made at [From.Capital.GetName] so as to accommodate its new warhorses...
The stables at [From.Capital.GetName] have been brought inside it's walls...
A new plot of land has been opened inside [From.Capital.GetName] walls so as to house its warhorses...
The stables at [From.Capital.GetName] are as big as some impoverished nobles keep...
Small bands of man-at-arms roam [From.Capital.GetName] somedays at night...
A small armed presence sometimes patrol the lands around [From.Capital.GetName]...
On fixed days men-at-arms do rounds near [From.Capital.GetName] keeping its smallfolk safe...
There is a constant presence of armed men-at-arms around [From.Capital.GetName] walls...
Small bands of cavalrymen rarely make patrol rounds around [From.Capital.GetName]...
Cavalry can be seen patrolling the countryside around [From.Capital.GetName] irregularly...
Every odd day the captain of [From.Capital.GetName] household guards organize mounted patrols...
There is a constant presence of mounted guards around [From.Capital.GetName] walls...
Small fees are sometimes collected from travelers trying to reach [From.Holder.Liege.Capital.GetName]...
A tolling station has been setup near an important crossing, now all travelers need to pay a fee if they are to reach [From.Holder.Liege.Capital.GetName]...
An watchtower has been built in the station to secure the toll for reaching [From.Holder.Liege.Capital.GetName] is paid...
A well provisioned garrison has been put in charge of making sure the toll for reaching [From.Holder.Liege.Capital.GetName] is paid...
The tolling system has been vastly augmented, now even secondary roads to [From.Holder.Liege.Capital.GetName] have their stations...
No road that leads to [From.Holder.Liege.Capital.GetName] is now free of toll collectors and man-at-arms...
A simple pier has been constructed at [From.Capital.GetName], where small boats and skiffs can anchor...
A harbor now reinforces [From.Capital.GetName] defenses, nothing to fancy, it can house a small amount of ships...
Fishing boats, trading vessels and galleys, all can come and go now with no major impediments...
A section of the now respectable port at [From.Capital.GetName], has been dedicated to its navy...
One of the main [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] ports, [From.Capital.GetName] powerful navy is partly anchored here...
A small blacksmith workshop can be found inside [From.Capital.GetName] walls...
With new tools and some apprentices tending the fires the blacksmith at [From.Capital.GetName] prospers...
With seniority playing a huge part the forge at [From.Capital.GetName] works day and night...
With the expansion of [From.Capital.GetName] forge ended it's arms output have been greatly augmented...
The forge at [From.Capital.GetName] looks mostly like a small shop, master weponsmith and armorsmith all bundled together...
Renovations to accommodate [From.Capital.GetName] blacksmithy have finished, masterworks all...
It's said that there are those who can work Valyrian steel at [From.Capital.GetName] smithy...
Weapons coming from [From.Capital.GetName] generally work, sharper than most though...
Work has been put into [From.Capital.GetName] weponsmith, and its household guards sure show it...
With new material and able hands secured, [From.Capital.GetName] smithy has begun producing quality arms...
The arms made at [From.Capital.GetName] are quickly beginning to take eminence among the [From.Location.Culture.GetName]...
Engraving, elaborate pommels or gilded guards, the smithy at [From.Capital.GetName] is well renowned for its quality arms...
Big enough to arm [From.Capital.GetName] levies, this forge weaponsmiths are well sought among [From.Holder.GetOnlyDynastyName] bannermen...
The old forge at [From.Capital.GetName] is said to produce only the finest [From.Location.Culture.GetName] steel...
Still made by the smallfolk at [From.Capital.GetName] village, these arrows have some small quality to them...
A retired man-at-arms has setup shop at [From.Capital.GetName] offering his expertise in manufacturing arrows...
Apprentices now have taken the fletching business, as their old master cant keep up with [From.Capital.GetName] growing demands...
The workshop at [From.Capital.GetName] has much to do with its archers success in battle...
[From.Capital.GetName] battlements are never wanting for arrows...
Be it for sport or war the noble houses sworn to [From.Holder.Liege.Capital.GetName] always seek this workshop for arrows...
[From.Capital.GetName] archers have gained renown across many battlefields thanks to the work done in this workshop...
Simple leather and padded armor are readily made at [From.Capital.GetName]...
Some metal plating is starting to be integrated in the armors made at [From.Capital.GetName]...
Armors made without interlocking metal rings is a rare sight at [From.Capital.GetName]...
Scale, lamellar or ring armor are all readily produced at [From.Capital.GetName] forge...
Full plated suits of armor are starting to be produced at [From.Capital.GetName]...
Be it iron or steel, the suits of armor made at [From.Capital.GetName] are of top quality...
The steel worked at this smithy is said to be the best the [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] has to offer...
A small patch of land has been cleared at [From.Capital.GetName] for horse-breeding...
The horses bred at [From.Capital.GetName] are starting to make a name for themselves...
A new acre of land has been cleared at [From.Capital.GetName] for horse-breeding...
Horses bred at [From.Capital.GetName] are among the finest cavalry the [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] has to offer...
Some noble houses are known to send trade delegations towards [From.Capital.GetName] hoping to buy some horses...
The horsemen of [From.Capital.GetName] are a fearsome lot in battle, their stallions almost unstoppable once charging...
Small disconnected farms can be spotted near [From.Capital.GetName]...
As [From.Capital.GetName] ruler's dipped some coin to develop land around their keep some new smallfolk have begun clearing new land...
The road to [From.Capital.GetName] leads down some farms and pastures...
The harvest at [From.Capital.GetName] is almost enough to meet its needs for the season...
It's been some time since [From.Capital.GetName] had any dire need for grain...
Farms and orchards dot the land around [From.Capital.GetName], so much so, that a small quantity of the grain harvest has been traded for awhile...
Every harvest season at [From.Capital.GetName] gives it's Lord great opportunities, the surplus of grain is simply too much...
It's said that the harvest at [From.Capital.GetName] alone could feed the North for much of it's winter...
Your men have a basic understanding on how to handle iron ore...
The steelworks at [From.Capital.GetName] are beginning to take a turn for the better...
With quality ore being funneled inside [From.Capital.GetName] walls it's steelworks is finally blooming...
The artisan's at [From.Capital.GetName] have just delivered several new kiln boosting its major steelworks production tremendously...
[From.Capital.GetName] furnaces work day and night, its output of steel eclipsing many other [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] steelworks...
Some smallfolk at [From.Capital.GetName] have been tasked with extracting wood from the Kingswood...
The lumber extracted from the Kingswood has been of great help to [From.Capital.GetName]...
The lumber operation at [From.Capital.GetName] part of the Kingswood sooner than later will be needing a new upgrade...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] has just built a brand new lumberyard in the Kingswood, near [From.Capital.GetName]...
Kingswood lumber from House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] can be found in almost every single kingdom of Westeros...
Some smallfolk at [From.Capital.GetName] have been tasked with extracting wood from the Rainwood...
The lumber extracted from the Rainwood has been of great help to [From.Capital.GetName]...
The lumber operation at [From.Capital.GetName] part of the Rainwood sooner than later will be needing a new upgrade...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] has just built a brand new lumberyard in the Rainwood, near [From.Capital.GetName]...
Rainwood lumber from House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] can be found in almost every single kingdom of Westeros...

Mistwood lumber from House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] can be found in almost every single kingdom of Westeros...

The lumber operation at [From.Capital.GetName] part of the Lemonwood sooner than later will be needing a new upgrade...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] has just built a brand new lumberyard in the Lemonwood, near [From.Capital.GetName]...
Lemonwood lumber from House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] can be found in almost every single kingdom of Westeros...

The lumber operation at [From.Capital.GetName] part of the Wolfwood sooner than later will be needing a new upgrade...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] has just built a brand new lumberyard in the Wolfwood, near [From.Capital.GetName]...
Wolfwood lumber from House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] can be found in almost every single kingdom of Westeros...
Men have begun exploring the dilapidated face of a small ravine for stone near [From.Capital.GetName]...
A small stone dig has been developed at [From.Capital.GetName]...
With the dig site getting bigger, the quantity of stone extracted near [From.Capital.GetName] is steadily increasing...
The smallfolk swarm into the large quarry at [From.Capital.GetName] like moths to a flame, the promise of sure work to tempting to pass...
The stone quarry of House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] is sought after by many noble houses in need of raw materials...
A coal seam has been discovered near [From.Capital.GetName] at a hilltop...
Some of [From.Capital.GetName] smallfolk have been tasked with sinking some preliminary shafts near the place coal was first discovered...
[From.Capital.GetName] coal extraction has been significantly increased after the first shafts sinked into the land proved coal rich...
New tunnels and shafts are always being dug at [From.Capital.GetName] coal mine...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] owns much of their wealth thanks to it's coal mines...
The smallfolk of [From.Capital.GetName] have discovered rock salt near a dig site...
The surface salt mining at [From.Capital.GetName] is being readily expanded...
Now completely underground, [From.Capital.GetName] salt mine consists of some small chambers...
Progress is slow in expanding [From.Capital.GetName] salt mines due to the toll it takes on it's miners health, but, as it stands, this mine is one of the largest in the known world...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] owns much of their wealth thanks to it's salt mines...
Marble has been found inside a rocky formation near [From.Capital.GetName]...
A small marble dig has been developed at [From.Capital.GetName]...
With the dig site getting larger, the quantity of marble extracted near [From.Capital.GetName] is steadily increasing...
Now on par with other more famous marble quarries, the one at [From.Capital.GetName] is sought after by nobles from Westeros and Essos...
The marble quarry of House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] is sought after by many noble houses in need of raw materials...

A small granite dig has been developed at [From.Capital.GetName]...
With the dig site getting larger, the quantity of granite extracted near [From.Capital.GetName] is steadily increasing...
Granite is one of the most important components in building solid walls, and the fortification at [From.Capital.GetName] show it...
The granite quarry of House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] is sought after by many noble houses in need of raw materials...

Most of the rooms opened by the shafts have yielded more copper veins...

House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] owns much of their wealth thanks to it's copper mines...

Most of the rooms opened by the shafts have yielded more dragonglass veins...

House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] owns much of their wealth thanks to it's dragonglass mines...
Hunting seals at [From.Capital.GetName] for their skins has been going since the dawn days some say...
Seal hunting at [From.Capital.GetName] is beginning to develop past subsistence levels...
The season where seals arrive at [From.Capital.GetName] to mate is always a busy one for hunters...
Most of [From.Capital.GetName] trade derives from the sealskin business...
[From.Holder.GetTitledName] fortunes are said to be tied with the trade of sealskin goods...
Hunting is a nobles past time at [From.Capital.GetName]...
More frequent hunts are being organized at [From.Capital.GetName]...
The woods near [From.Capital.GetName] usually don't stay empty for long periods of time...
Hound-masters, hunt-masters and man-at-arms, the hunting business at [From.Capital.GetName] drums up quite the manpower...
Hunting is considered more than a past time at [From.Capital.GetName]...
A master jeweler operates a tiny shop at [From.Capital.GetName]...
The jewelry business thrives under [From.Capital.GetName] walls...
The stones being circulated at [From.Capital.GetName] are growing in prestige by the day...
[From.Capital.GetName] valuable stones are procured with great interest by many Kings...
[From.Capital.GetName] boasts of having the finest valuable stone market in the known world...
Cloth and linen aplenty can be found at [From.Capital.GetName] markets...
The textile business at [From.Capital.GetName] if beginning to take flight outside it's walls...
[From.Capital.GetName] tapestries and other textile goods adorn many foreign courts...
[From.Capital.GetName] textile goods are regarded as kingly gifts by many...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] draws considerable wealth from their textile goods...
A small place where the [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] can worship the [Root.Location.Religion.GetName]...
A secluded part of the castle where the [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] can worship the [Root.Location.Religion.GetName]...
A dedicated part of the castle where the [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] can worship the [Root.Location.Religion.GetName]...
At [From.Capital.GetName] you cant help but notice the growing vineyards around its keep...
Most of the countryside near [From.Capital.GetName] is dominated by vineyards...
Vineyards used to be seen only around [From.Capital.GetName], but, by now, it's almost all one can see in [From.Holder.Liege.GetPrimaryTitles]...
[From.Capital.GetName] countryside is beautifully adorned with vineyards as far as the eye can see...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] draws considerable wealth from their vineyards...
The inns and taverns surrounding [From.Capital.GetName] have begun serving this locally produced wine...
Most [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] prefer the wine produced here than most foreign ones...
Renowned across the continent, this winery produces one of the most sought after wines available...
A household name, this winery has ships from across the known world anchoring at any available port where it's wine is being sold...
At [From.Capital.GetName] you cant help but notice the growing orchards around its keep...
Most of the countryside near [From.Capital.GetName] is dominated by orchards...
Orchards used to be seen only around [From.Capital.GetName], but, by now, it's almost all one can see in [From.Holder.Liege.GetPrimaryTitles]...
The lands around [From.Capital.GetName] are dominated with orchards as far as the eye can see...
House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] draws considerable wealth from their plump plums and succulent peaches...
Some subsistence cattle farming can be found around [From.Capital.GetName]...
The smallfolk around [From.Capital.GetName] split their time between their day-to-day tasks and their liege cattle farm...
Cattle farming is a common sight around [From.Capital.GetName] countryside...
New pastures are always being cleared around [From.Capital.GetName] for it's growing cattle stock...
[From.Capital.GetName] has begun an open range policy so as to accommodate its growing cattle herd...
One of House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] main livelihoods comes from cattle farming...
Some subsistence sheep farming can be found around [From.Capital.GetName]...
The smallfolk around [From.Capital.GetName] split their time between their day-to-day tasks and their liege sheep farm...
Sheep farming is a common sight around [From.Capital.GetName] countryside...
New pastures are always being cleared around [From.Capital.GetName] for it's growing sheep stock...
[From.Capital.GetName] has begun an open range policy so as to accommodate its growing sheep herd...
One of House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] main livelihoods comes from sheep farming...
Some subsistence goat farming can be found around [From.Capital.GetName]...
The smallfolk around [From.Capital.GetName] split their time between their day-to-day tasks and their liege goat farm...
Goat farming is a common sight around [From.Capital.GetName] countryside...
New pastures are always being cleared around [From.Capital.GetName] for it's growing goat stock...
[From.Capital.GetName] has begun an open range policy so as to accommodate its growing goat herd...
One of House [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] main livelihoods comes from goat farming...
Fishing around [From.Capital.GetName] is still predominantly practiced in rivers and lakes with nets and spears...
Some small fishing villages are beginning to form near [From.Capital.GetName]...
The smallfolk have settled some lands around the coast near [From.Capital.GetName]...
The fish market at [From.Capital.GetName] is pretty well known among the [Root.Location.Culture.GetName]...
More and more of the smallfolk flock to the growing fishing town near [From.Capital.GetName] walls...
It's said that more people live at the coastal village near [From.Capital.GetName] than in the rest of the [Root.Location.Culture.GetName] lands combined...
